text:
[Verse]
Stars above us shining bright
In the coolness of the night
Whispers float through gentle breeze
Chasing all our wildest dreams

[Verse 2]
Moonlight dances on our skin
Lost in moments deep within
Hearts are beating with desire
Fueling dreams that won’t expire

[Chorus]
Underneath this sky so wide
We won't let our dreams subside
Hand in hand we'll touch the stars
Starlit dreams
They will be ours

[Verse 3]
Sky ablaze with cosmic light
Guiding us through endless night
Every wish a spark ignites
In this world of pure delights

[Bridge]
Dreams are glowing high above
Bathing us in endless love
Feel the magic in the air
Starlit dreams beyond compare

[Chorus]
Underneath this sky so wide
We won't let our dreams subside
Hand in hand we'll touch the stars
Starlit dreams
They will be ours
title: Starlit Dreams
